meanings.definition: A hollow metal object, typically in the shape of a deep inverted cup widening at the lip, that sounds a clear musical note when struck.
meanings.sent1: The church bells rang loudly on Sunday morning.
meanings.sent2: I heard the jingle of sleigh bells as Santa approached.
meanings.sent3: The bells on the cat's collar tinkled as it prowled around the house.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed like bells in the empty hallway.
meanings.sent5: The wind carried the sound of distant bells through the valley.

meanings.definition: A device that makes a ringing sound when struck.
meanings.sent1: The doorbell chimed as the guests arrived.
meanings.sent2: The alarm clock's bells woke me up at dawn.
meanings.sent3: The bells on the bicycle handlebars jingled with each bump in the road.
meanings.sent4: His voice had a bell-like quality that resonated in the room.
meanings.sent5: The sleigh bells on the horse's harness added a festive touch to the parade.

meanings.sent1: The flower had delicate petals that formed a bell shape.
meanings.sent2: The dress had a beautiful lace bell sleeve design.
meanings.sent3: The bell-shaped lampshade cast a soft glow in the room.
meanings.sent4: The bell of the trumpet flared out elegantly as he played.
meanings.sent5: The bell-shaped top of the mushroom made it easy to identify in the forest.
